snippet: The triumph of Usain Bolt in the men’s 100-meter sprints delighted his followers in Brixton, a London neighborhood that’s home to a large and proud Jamaican population.
abstract: Usain Bolt's triumph in the men's 100-meter sprint delights his followers in Brixton, a London neighborhood that is home to a large and proud Jamaican population; as people in Brixton are quick to point out, it is nothing short of remarkable that a nation of 2.7 million has produced the fastest men and women in the world.
lead_paragraph: The triumph of Usain Bolt in the men’s 100-meter sprints delighted his followers in Brixton, a London neighborhood that’s home to a large and proud Jamaican population.

headline.seo: Usain Bolt of Jamaica Overjoys Brixton With 100-Meter Gold
headline.main: In Britain’s Little Jamaica, Rejoicing Over a Speedster
headline.print_headline: In Britain’s Little Jamaica, Rejoicing Over a Speedster
